Hi, I'm Lennart. I'm a doctoral student in the [Econometrics Group](https://www.uni-bielefeld.de/fakultaeten/wirtschaftswissenschaften/lehrbereiche/econometrics/) at Bielefeld University. I like data science, teaching data science, and developing tools for data science in R.

In my spare time, you can find me 

- [above the clouds](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c2vc8qY3B5c), 
- on the tennis court, 
- or in front of a chess board.

I use this website to

- present my [research](research.qmd), 
- list my [talks](talks.qmd), 
- and share my [projects](projects.qmd).
